page.title: 09Education
page.content: In our village we have a playgroup, infants school and a junior school all on the same premises.The playgroup is open five days a week for three and four year olds.The three year olds have two sessions a week and the four year olds have three. About twenty four to thirty children go to each session. The infant school has one hundred and sixty seven children and six teachers. They are well eqiupped, for example they have a computer. When the children are seven they move up to the Junior School which at present has two hundred and three pupils. St Andrews junior school is an open plan school there are seven bases and eight members of staff. This year we have a teacher on exchange from New Zealand. We have our own computer and school minibus.
